answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Kathleen, 
Here are a few general resources on management agreements of land that include sections on leasing or subleasing. I believe that you will hope these documents useful and hopefully someone can chime in on your specific situation. 
-Property Management: Policies and Procedures https://icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/2493
-Innovative Ideas for Managing Property and Buildings http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/question/20752
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Kathleen Margoles
text: The City of Oakland Park is developing a Central (Public) Market as an anchor to our Culinary Arts District.  We will be leasing space and contributing to the buildout.  We are hiring an operator for the market who will sublease from us and then lease to vendors.   Does anyone have examples of leases and/or management agreements for a similar venture?
title: Management Agreement for operator of Central Market
